Despite her deformed body, she is quite beautiful.}} ==Useful Info== '''Lamia''' is a [[unique]] spellcasting [[list of nagas|naga]] that can be generated in the [[Snake Pit]]. She always generates with a powerful [[polearm]] (often of [[distortion]]) and a [[superb item]] [[naga barding]], can [[mesmerize]] her prey to prevent them from escaping her [[constriction|coils]], and devastates those who fight at range with brutal attack spells. ==Location== *The [[Snake Pit]]: 2-5 ==Spells== {{Spellcaster |number= |slot1=[[Orb of Destruction]] (9d16) |slot2=[[Mesmerise]] |slot3=[[Haste]] |slot4=[[Poison Arrow]] (3d25) |slot5=''none'' |slot6=[[Teleport Self]] }} {{clear}} ==Tips & Tricks== *Lamia is one of the deadlier uniques in the mid-game, capable of dealing very heavy damage both in melee and at range. If you cannot casually defeat [[naga warrior]]s in melee, don't even think of attempting it against Lamia. *Although you probably won't be in the Snake Pit without it, [[poison]] resistance is extremely useful when fighting Lamia, if only to significantly reduce the impact of her [[Poison Arrow]]s. *[[Clarity]] will render you immune to her [[Mesmerise]], as will very high [[magic resistance]]. Losing the ability to flee her, especially when other enemies happen to be around, can be extremely fatal. If all else fails, an ''uncontrolled'' [[teleport]] will allow you to escape, even if constricted. *Although you may be able to outrun her, you can't outrun her [[Orb of Destruction]]. See that spell's article for tips on dealing with it. ==History== Lamia was added in [[0.12]] and removed in [[0.14]]. Prior to [[0.13]], Lamia traveled with a large band of naga allies.
